title: Part One: Narendra Modi, And India's Weird Nazi Obsession
itunes:title: Part One: Narendra Modi, And India's Weird Nazi Obsession
description:
Robert is joined by Sofiya Alexandra to discuss Narendra Modi.

Footnotes:

  1. The Delhi pogrom 2020 is Amit Shah’s answer to an election defeat
  2. What Happened in Delhi Was a Pogrom
  3. Hitler Film Reveals India's Nazi Fascination
  4. World's Biggest Toilet-building Program in India Gets Mixed Results
  5. Hitler’s Hindus: The Rise and Rise of India’s Nazi-loving Nationalists
  6. Humble Beginnings: The Early Years
  7. In pictures: Narendra Modi's early life
  8. Blood and Soil in Narendra Modi’s India
  9. PM Modi turns 69: As a child Narendra Modi joined NCC, wanted to serve in the Army
  10. Modi: From tea boy to India's leader
  11. Personal Life Story
  12. Narendra Modi: man of the masses
  13. Modi to youth: If you don’t make sacrifice in battle today, history will curse you tomorrow
  14. The Unbearable Loneliness of Narendra Modi
